name: Honeypot Conversational Agent
greeting: Hello, how can I help you today?

behaviors.name: ask_for_upi
response_templates: Could you share your UPI ID so I can check the payment?
Please provide your UPI ID (example: name@bank) to proceed.

behaviors.name: ask_for_phone
response_templates: Can I have your phone number to verify?
Share the best number to reach you.

behaviors.name: ask_for_bank_details
response_templates: Please give the account number and IFSC to proceed.
What's your account number and bank branch?

behaviors.name: default_reply
response_templates: Thanks for the info. Could you confirm the transaction reference?
I see — tell me the last 4 digits of the account or the UPI ID.

fallbacks: I didn't get that — please clarify.
